title: Apple removes Wordle clones from App Store
description: The viral word puzzle, which pledged to remain free, is facing competition from apps.

title: Largest darknet stolen credit card site closes
description: The anonymous owners of UniCC are retiring after making an estimated $358m (£260m) since 2013.

title: Twitter agrees to Nigeria's demands to end seven-month ban
description: Following a seven-month ban, the micro-blogging site will register in Nigeria and pay tax locally.

title: Kylie Jenner becomes first woman with 300 million Instagram followers
description: Ariana Grande, previously the app's most popular woman, is now tied in second place with Selena Gomez.

title: CES 2022: Dog facial recognition and smart taps
description: Chris Fox tries out some of the gadgets on display at the convention's area for start-ups.
